如果您想得到关闭的原因，您应该访问或属性。 If you would like to get the reason for the close, you should access the or property.

member.name: P:WebSocketSharp.CloseEventArgs.WasClean
member.summary: 获取一个值，该值指示WebSocket连接是否已完全关闭。 Gets a value indicating whether the WebSocket connection has been closed cleanly.
member.value: 如果WebSocket连接已完全关闭，则为true；否则为false。 true if the WebSocket connection has been closed cleanly; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode
member.summary: 包含WebSocket连接关闭的状态代码值。 Contains the values of the status code for the WebSocket connection close.

remarks.para: 第647.55节中定义了RFC的状态值。 The values of the status code are defined in Section 7.4 of RFC 6455.

端点不得将“保留值”设置为关闭控制框中的状态码。它被指定用于需要状态码来指示由于系统接地而关闭连接的应用程序中。 "Reserved value" must not be set as a status code in a close control frame by an endpoint. It's designated for use in applications expecting a status code to indicate that the connection was closed due to the system grounds.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.Normal
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1000。表示正常关闭。 Equivalent to close status 1000. Indicates a normal close.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.Away
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1001。指示终结点正在消失。 Equivalent to close status 1001. Indicates that an endpoint is going away.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.ProtocolError
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1002。指示终结点由于协议错误而终止连接。 Equivalent to close status 1002. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection due to a protocol error.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.IncorrectData
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1003。指示终结点由于接收到不可接受的类型消息而终止连接。 Equivalent to close status 1003. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received an unacceptable type message.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.Undefined
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1004。仍然没有定义。保留值。 Equivalent to close status 1004. Still undefined. A Reserved value.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.NoStatusCode
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1005。表示没有实际存在的状态代码。保留值。 Equivalent to close status 1005. Indicates that no status code was actually present. A Reserved value.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.Abnormal
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1006。指示连接异常关闭。保留值。 Equivalent to close status 1006. Indicates that the connection was closed abnormally. A Reserved value.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.InconsistentData
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1007。指示终结点正在终止连接，因为它接收到的消息包含与消息类型不一致的数据。 Equivalent to close status 1007. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that contains a data that isn't consistent with the type of the message.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.PolicyViolation
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1008。指示终结点由于接收到违反其策略的消息而终止连接。 Equivalent to close status 1008. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that violates its policy.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.TooBig
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1009。指示终结点正在终止连接，因为它接收到的消息太大，无法处理。 Equivalent to close status 1009. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that is too big to process.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.IgnoreExtension
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1010。指示客户端正在终止连接，因为它希望服务器协商一个或多个扩展，但服务器没有在握手响应中返回这些扩展。 Equivalent to close status 1010. Indicates that the client is terminating the connection because it has expected the server to negotiate one or more extension, but the server didn't return them in the handshake response.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.ServerError
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1011。指示服务器正在终止连接，因为它遇到了阻止它完成请求的意外情况。 Equivalent to close status 1011. Indicates that the server is terminating the connection because it has encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CloseStatusCode.TlsHandshakeFailure
member.summary: 相当于关闭状态1015。指示连接由于执行TLS握手失败而关闭。保留值。 Equivalent to close status 1015. Indicates that the connection was closed due to a failure to perform a TLS handshake. A Reserved value.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.CompressionMethod.Deflate
member.summary: 表示使用DEFLATE。 Indicates using DEFLATE.

member.remarks: HttpStatusCode枚举包含RFC 2616中为HTTP 1.1定义的HTTP状态代码的值。 The HttpStatusCode enumeration contains the values of the HTTP status codes defined in RFC 2616 for HTTP 1.1.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Continue
member.summary: 相当于状态代码100。指示客户端应继续其请求。 Equivalent to status code 100. Indicates that the client should continue with its request.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.SwitchingProtocols
member.summary: 相当于状态代码101。指示服务器正在切换连接上的HTTP版本或协议。 Equivalent to status code 101. Indicates that the server is switching the HTTP version or protocol on the connection.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Ok
member.summary: 相当于状态代码200。指示客户端的请求已成功。 Equivalent to status code 200. Indicates that the client's request has succeeded.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Created
member.summary: 相当于状态代码201。指示客户端的请求已完成，并导致正在创建新资源。 Equivalent to status code 201. Indicates that the client's request has been fulfilled and resulted in a new resource being created.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Accepted
member.summary: 相当于状态代码202。指示已接受客户端的请求进行处理，但处理尚未完成。 Equivalent to status code 202. Indicates that the client's request has been accepted for processing, but the processing hasn't been completed.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.NonAuthoritativeInformation
member.summary: 相当于状态代码203。指示返回的元信息来自本地或第三方副本，而不是源服务器。 Equivalent to status code 203. Indicates that the returned metainformation is from a local or a third-party copy instead of the origin server.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.NoContent
member.summary: 相当于状态代码204。指示服务器已满足客户端的请求，但不需要返回实体正文。 Equivalent to status code 204. Indicates that the server has fulfilled the client's request but doesn't need to return an entity-body.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.ResetContent
member.summary: 相当于状态代码205。指示服务器已满足客户端的请求，并且用户代理应重置导致发送请求的文档视图。 Equivalent to status code 205. Indicates that the server has fulfilled the client's request, and the user agent should reset the document view which caused the request to be sent.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.PartialContent
member.summary: 相当于状态代码206。指示服务器已完成资源的部分GET请求。 Equivalent to status code 206. Indicates that the server has fulfilled the partial GET request for the resource.

summary.para: 相当于状态代码300。请求的多个表示对应于任何资源。 Equivalent to status code 300. Indicates that the requested resource corresponds to any of multiple representations.
多重回声是含糊不清的同义词。 MultipleChoices is a synonym for Ambiguous.
相当于状态代码300。指示请求的资源对应于多个表示中的任意一个。 Equivalent to status code 300. Indicates that the requested resource corresponds to any of multiple representations.
暧昧是多重回声的同义词。 Ambiguous is a synonym for MultipleChoices.

相当于状态代码301。指示已为请求的资源分配了新的永久URI，将来对此资源的任何引用都应使用其中一个返回的URI。 Equivalent to status code 301. Indicates that the requested resource has been assigned a new permanent URI and any future references to this resource should use one of the returned URIs.
MovedPermanently是Moved的同义词。 MovedPermanently is a synonym for Moved.

相当于状态代码301。指示已为请求的资源分配了新的永久URI，将来对此资源的任何引用都应使用其中一个返回的URI。 Equivalent to status code 301. Indicates that the requested resource has been assigned a new permanent URI and any future references to this resource should use one of the returned URIs.
Moved是MovedPermanently的同义词。 Moved is a synonym for MovedPermanently.
相当于状态代码302。指示请求的资源临时位于其他URI下。 Equivalent to status code 302. Indicates that the requested resource is located temporarily under a different URI.
Found是重定向的同义词。 Found is a synonym for Redirect.
相当于状态代码302。指示请求的资源临时位于其他URI下。 Equivalent to status code 302. Indicates that the requested resource is located temporarily under a different URI.
重定向是Found的同义词。 Redirect is a synonym for Found.

相当于状态代码303。指示可以在不同的URI下找到对请求的响应，并应使用该资源上的GET方法检索该响应。 Equivalent to status code 303. Indicates that the response to the request can be found under a different URI and should be retrieved using a GET method on that resource.
SeeOther是RedirectMethod的同义词。 SeeOther is a synonym for RedirectMethod.

相当于状态代码303。指示可以在不同的URI下找到对请求的响应，并应使用该资源上的GET方法检索该响应。 Equivalent to status code 303. Indicates that the response to the request can be found under a different URI and should be retrieved using a GET method on that resource.
RedirectMethod是SeeOther的同义词。 RedirectMethod is a synonym for SeeOther.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.NotModified
member.summary: 相当于状态代码304。指示客户端已执行条件GET请求，允许访问，但文档尚未修改。 Equivalent to status code 304. Indicates that the client has performed a conditional GET request and access is allowed, but the document hasn't been modified.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.UseProxy
member.summary: 相当于状态代码305。指示必须通过位置字段给定的代理访问请求的资源。 Equivalent to status code 305. Indicates that the requested resource must be accessed through the proxy given by the Location field.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Unused
member.summary: 相当于状态代码306。此状态代码已在规范的早期版本中使用，不再使用，保留供将来使用。 Equivalent to status code 306. This status code was used in a previous version of the specification, is no longer used, and is reserved for future use.

summary.para: 相当于状态代码307。指示请求的资源临时位于其他URI下。 Equivalent to status code 307. Indicates that the requested resource is located temporarily under a different URI.
临时重定向是RedirectKeepVerb的同义词。 TemporaryRedirect is a synonym for RedirectKeepVerb.
相当于状态代码307。指示请求的资源临时位于其他URI下。 Equivalent to status code 307. Indicates that the requested resource is located temporarily under a different URI.
RedirectKeepVerb是TemporaryRedirect的同义词。 RedirectKeepVerb is a synonym for TemporaryRedirect.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.BadRequest
member.summary: 相当于状态代码400。表示由于语法错误，服务器无法理解客户端的请求。 Equivalent to status code 400. Indicates that the client's request couldn't be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized
member.summary: 相当于状态代码401。指示客户端的请求需要用户身份验证。 Equivalent to status code 401. Indicates that the client's request requires user authentication.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.PaymentRequired
member.summary: 相当于状态代码402。此状态代码保留供将来使用。 Equivalent to status code 402. This status code is reserved for future use.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Forbidden
member.summary: 相当于状态代码403。表示服务器已理解客户端的请求，但拒绝执行该请求。 Equivalent to status code 403. Indicates that the server understood the client's request but is refusing to fulfill it.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.NotFound
member.summary: 相当于状态码404。指示服务器未找到任何与请求URI匹配的内容。 Equivalent to status code 404. Indicates that the server hasn't found anything matching the request URI.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.MethodNotAllowed
member.summary: 相当于状态代码405。指示请求行中指定的方法不允许用于由请求URI标识的资源。 Equivalent to status code 405. Indicates that the method specified in the request line isn't allowed for the resource identified by the request URI.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.NotAcceptable
member.summary: 相当于状态代码406。指示服务器没有适当的资源来响应客户端请求中的Accept标头。 Equivalent to status code 406. Indicates that the server doesn't have the appropriate resource to respond to the Accept headers in the client's request.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.ProxyAuthenticationRequired
member.summary: 相当于状态代码407。指示客户端必须首先使用代理对其自身进行身份验证。 Equivalent to status code 407. Indicates that the client must first authenticate itself with the proxy.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.RequestTimeout
member.summary: 相当于状态代码408。指示客户端未在服务器准备等待的时间内生成请求。 Equivalent to status code 408. Indicates that the client didn't produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Conflict
member.summary: 相当于状态码409。指示由于服务器上的冲突而无法完成客户端的请求。 Equivalent to status code 409. Indicates that the client's request couldn't be completed due to a conflict on the server.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.Gone
member.summary: 相当于状态代码410。表示请求的资源在服务器上不再可用，并且不知道转发地址。 Equivalent to status code 410. Indicates that the requested resource is no longer available at the server and no forwarding address is known.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.LengthRequired
member.summary: 相当于状态代码411。指示服务器拒绝接受未定义内容长度的客户端请求。 Equivalent to status code 411. Indicates that the server refuses to accept the client's request without a defined Content-Length.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.PreconditionFailed
member.summary: 相当于状态代码412。指示在服务器上测试时，一个或多个请求头中给定的前提条件计算为false。 Equivalent to status code 412. Indicates that the precondition given in one or more of the request headers evaluated to false when it was tested on the server.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.RequestEntityTooLarge
member.summary: 相当于状态代码413。指示客户端请求的实体大于服务器愿意或能够处理的实体。 Equivalent to status code 413. Indicates that the entity of the client's request is larger than the server is willing or able to process.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.RequestUriTooLong
member.summary: 相当于状态代码414。指示请求URI比服务器愿意解释的长度长。 Equivalent to status code 414. Indicates that the request URI is longer than the server is willing to interpret.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.UnsupportedMediaType
member.summary: 相当于状态代码415。指示客户端请求的实体的格式不受所请求方法的所请求资源的支持。 Equivalent to status code 415. Indicates that the entity of the client's request is in a format not supported by the requested resource for the requested method.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.RequestedRangeNotSatisfiable
member.summary: 相当于状态代码416。指示范围请求标头中的范围说明符值均不与选定资源的当前范围重叠。 Equivalent to status code 416. Indicates that none of the range specifier values in a Range request header overlap the current extent of the selected resource.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.ExpectationFailed
member.summary: 相当于状态代码417。指示服务器无法满足Expect请求标头中给定的期望。 Equivalent to status code 417. Indicates that the expectation given in an Expect request header couldn't be met by the server.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.InternalServerError
member.summary: 相当于状态代码500。指示服务器遇到意外情况，使其无法满足客户端的请求。 Equivalent to status code 500. Indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the client's request.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.NotImplemented
member.summary: 相当于状态代码501。指示服务器不支持满足客户端请求所需的功能。 Equivalent to status code 501. Indicates that the server doesn't support the functionality required to fulfill the client's request.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.BadGateway
member.summary: 相当于状态代码502。指示网关或代理服务器从上游服务器接收到无效响应。 Equivalent to status code 502. Indicates that a gateway or proxy server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.ServiceUnavailable
member.summary: 相当于状态代码503。表示由于服务器临时过载或维护，服务器当前无法处理客户端的请求。 Equivalent to status code 503. Indicates that the server is currently unable to handle the client's request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.GatewayTimeout
member.summary: 相当于状态代码504。表示网关或代理服务器没有从上游服务器或其他辅助服务器接收到及时响应。 Equivalent to status code 504. Indicates that a gateway or proxy server didn't receive a timely response from the upstream server or some other auxiliary server.

member.name: F:WebSocketSharp.Net.HttpStatusCode.HttpVersionNotSupported
member.summary: 相当于状态代码505。指示服务器不支持客户端请求中使用的HTTP版本。 Equivalent to status code 505. Indicates that the server doesn't support the HTTP version used in the client's request.

member.summary: 提供HTTP 1.1的实例。 Provides a instance for HTTP 1.1.
